title: A great opportunity to buy a land from Dewalapola, Nittambuwa for the lowest price!!!
details: Land from Siyane City, Dewalapola, by Maradagahamula Road. 15 perches. Square land. 200 metres to the Maha Junction, Nittambuwa -Katunayake Road. Electricity and water. Selling immediately for the for the highest bid. Call today itself for details and location 0719135089
